channel.title: Transports on my trip navigation
channel.description: Recent content in Transports on my trip navigation

item.title: Vancouver
item.description: How to Get Around by Public Transportation TransLink「Complete Metro Vancouver Transit System Map」 https://www.translink.ca/schedules-and-maps/bus-schedules TransLink「SkyTrain Schedules」 https://www.translink.ca/schedules-and-maps/skytrain TransLink「West Coast Express Schedules」 https://www.translink.ca/schedules-and-maps/west-coast-express VIA-RAIL「Explore Canada by Train」 https://www.viarail.ca/en/explore-our-destinations/trains ransLink「SeaBus Schedules」 https://www.translink.ca/schedules-and-maps/seabus FALSE CREEK FERRIES「Plan Your Trip」 https://granvilleislandferries.bc.ca/plan-your-trip/ Aquabus「Plan Your Trip with the Aquabus Granville Island False Creek Ferry」 https://theaquabus.com/ BC Ferries「Explore our routes」 https://www.bcferries.com/routes-fares/discover-route-map Taxi, Uber, Lyft Uber https://play.google.com/store/search?q=uber&c=apps Lyft https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=me.lyft.android Mobi by Shaw Go - Vancouver https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.choosit.smoove Tips Compass Card The Compass card is a contactless smart card automated fare collection system used primarily for public transit in Metro Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.

item.title: Miami
item.description: How to Get Around by Public Transportation MIAMI-DADE COUNTY「METROBUS SYSTEM」 https://www.miamidade.gov/transit/library/system-map-brochure.pdf Miami-Dade County「Route 150 Miami Beach Airport Express Route Map」 https://www.miamidade.gov/transit/library/routes/150.pdf City of Miami「Trolley System Map」 https://www.miamigov.com/files/assets/public/document-resources/pdf-docs/trolley-maps/systemtrolleymap508.pdf Miami-Dade County「Metrorail Map」 https://www.miamidade.gov/transit/library/metrorail-map.pdf Miami-Dade County「metromover-map」 https://www.miamidade.gov/transit/library/metromover-map.pdf Brightline「Train Stations in Florida」 https://www.gobrightline.com/train-stations Tri Rail「System Map」 https://media.tri-rail.com/Files/About/Rider%20Information/System%20Map/2019%20System%20Map%20by%20zone_Cropped.jpg AMTRAK「The Amtrak Network」 https://www.amtrak.com/home.html Tips EASY Card The Easy Card system is a series of linked contactless smartcard systems used by Miami-Dade Transit and South Florida Regional Transportation Authority in the South Florida area.

item.title: Chicago
item.description: How to Get Around by Public Transportation CTA「Schedules & routes」 https://www.transitchicago.com/schedules/ Metra Rail https://ridertools.metrarail.com/maps-schedules/system-map Chicago Water Taxi「Connecting Chicago」 https://www.chicagowatertaxi.com/ Shoreline Sightseeing「Shoreline Water Taxis」 https://shorelinewatertaxi.com/ Divvy Bikes https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.motivateco.chicagoapp Tips Ventra Card Ventra is an electronic fare payment system for Regional Transportation Authority which replaced the Chicago Card and the Transit Card automated fare collection systems. Ventra is the convenient fare payment system for CTA, Pace and Metra that allows customers to pay for train and bus rides throughout Chicagoland.

item.title: Sandiego
item.description: How to Get Around by Public Transportation Maps and Schedules https://www.sdmts.com/getting-around/maps-and-schedules All bus routes https://www.sdmts.com/transit-services/bus-routes Trolley https://www.sdmts.com/transit-services/trolley Trip Planner https://www.sdmts.com/getting-around/trip-planner BREEZE Bus https://gonctd.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/NCTD-System-Map-April-2023-w.pdf COASTER https://gonctd.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/COASTER-Schedule-Flyer-April-3-2023.pdf SPRINTER https://gonctd.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/SPRINTER-Schedule-April-2-2023.pdf AMTRAK「The Amtrak Network」 https://www.amtrak.com/home.html Taxi, Uber, Lyft Uber https://play.google.com/store/search?q=uber&c=apps Lyft https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=me.lyft.android Tips PRONTO Card Pronto, stylized as PRONTO, is the second-generation contactless payment system for automated fare collection on public transit services in San Diego County, California. https://www.ridepronto.com/ https://www.sdmts.com/fares/pronto Apps Offline transportation map https://play.

item.title: Los Angeles
item.description: How to Get Around by Public Transportation https://www.metro.net/riding/guide/system-maps/ Metro「Bus and Rail System detail」 https://cdn.beta.metro.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/03165615/bus-rail-system-detail.pdf LADOT Transit「DASH System Map」 https://www.ladottransit.com/map/sysmap_dash.pdf Big Blue Bus「SYSTEM MAP」 https://www.bigbluebus.com/routes-and-schedules/ Culver CityBus「Bus Schedules」 https://www.culvercitybus.com/Bus-Schedules BRT：Bus Rapid Transit https://www.metro.net/riding/schedules/ https://cdn.beta.metro.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/03165615/bus-rail-system-detail.pdf FLYAWAY https://www.flylax.com/flyaway-bus Metro「Maps & Schedules」 https://www.metro.net/riding/schedules/ METROLINK「SCHEDULES」 https://metrolinktrains.com/rider-info/general-info/maps/ AMTRAK「The Amtrak Network」 https://www.amtrak.com/home.html Ferry-Catalina Express「Maps」 https://www.catalinaexpress.com/schedule-fares.html Taxi, Uber, Lyft Uber https://play.google.com/store/search?q=uber&c=apps Lyft https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=me.lyft.android Metro Bike Share https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bicycletransit.MetroBikeShare Tips TAP card The Transit Access Pass is a contactless smart card used for automated fare collection on most public transport services within Los Angeles County, California.

item.title: SanFrancisco
item.description: How to Get Around by Public Transportation SFMTA「Muni Service Map」 https://www.sfmta.com/maps/muni-service-map BART「Schedules」 https://www.bart.gov/sites/default/files/docs/BARTDetailedMapWeb.pdf SFMTA「Muni Metro Map」 https://www.sfmta.com/maps/muni-metro-map San Francisco Bay Ferry「Routes & Schedules」 https://sanfranciscobayferry.com/routes-and-schedules Taxi, Uber, Lyft Uber https://play.google.com/store/search?q=uber&c=apps Lyft https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=me.lyft.android Tips Clipper Card: Clipper is the all-in-one transit card used for contactless fare payments throughout the San Francisco Bay Area. https://www.clippercard.com/ClipperWeb/ Clipper customers get discounts on one-way fares of 50 cents for adults, 25 cents for youth and 19 cents for senior and disabled riders.

item.title: Seattle
item.description: How to Get Around by Public Transportation The system maps include information on key destinations, landmarks and connecting services and transfer points in 5 areas of King County. All Schedule and Map could be found and download from here. https://kingcounty.gov/en/dept/metro/routes-and-service/schedules-and-maps Northwest area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-nw Northeast area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-ne Central area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-central Southwest area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-sw Southeast area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-se Kings County Metro https://kingcounty.gov/~/media/depts/metro/maps/seattle/09172022/pdf/downtown-seattle-frequency-geo-map.pdf RapidRide https://kingcounty.gov/en/dept/metro/routes-and-service/schedules-and-maps#rapidride-1 Sound Transit current service https://www.soundtransit.org/sites/default/files/documents/st-current-service-map.pdf Link Light Rail https://www.soundtransit.org/sites/default/files/documents/st-current-service-map.pdf

CharlieCards are available at fare vending machines in most subway stations.

item.title: Japan
item.description: Things you need to know before going to Japan for a smooth go “Fast Track”(for quarantine) and Visit Japan web service (for immigration and customs declaration) Visit Japan Web: https://vjw-lp.digital.go.jp/en/ Visit Japan Web is a web service that people entering to Japan（and Japanese returning to Japan）can use for Quarantine, Immigration and Customs procedures in order to enter/return to Japan. Vaccine requirements: https://www.mhlw.go.jp/stf/english/index.html Fast Track: https://www.hco.mhlw.go.jp/en/ => quarantine Transit Search Sites (Online) https://world.

item.title: Dubai
item.description: How to Get Around by Public Transportation Metro: The Red Line (which has stations at or near most of the major tourist destinations and along The Sheikh Zayed Road), and The Green Line (which has stations along the residential part of the city). Red Line: Runs from Rashidiya to UAE Exchange. Green Line: Connects Etisalat to Creek. Route planner https://www.rta.ae/wps/portal/rta/ae/public-transport/journeyplanner Dubai Tram:The Dubai Tram links the Dubai Metro and the Palm Monorail, making it convenient for you to explore the restaurants and attractions in the JBR district and Palm Jumeirah.

item.title: Paris
item.description: Route Search Latest Maps for free Download Find your timetable Visiting Paris and its surrounding areas Everything you need to know to plan your visit to Paris and the Île-de-France region. Bonjour RATP app Preparing your trip to Paris: hours of operation Weekdays, the metro operates from 5:30 a.m. to about 1:15 a.m. On Friday and Saturday evenings, as well as on the eve of bank holidays, trains run until about 2:15 a.

item.title: Bangkok
item.description: How to Get Around by Public Transportation BTS(BTS Skytrain): bookmark the jpg link below to use in our app for high resolution. https://www.bts.co.th/assets/images/yellow-map.jpg https://www.bts.co.th/eng/routemap.html MRT https://metro.bemplc.co.th/MRT-System-Map?lang=en ARL Airport Rail Link https://www.bangkokairportonline.com/bangkok-airport-rail-link/ SRT red line: The SRT Dark Red Line operates between Bang Sue Grand Station and Rangsit in Pathum Thani province, just North of Bangkok https://www.thailandee.com/en/transportation-thailand/srt-red-line-bangkok Chao Phraya River Express Boat https://www.chaophrayaexpressboat.com/chaophrayaexpressboat?lang=en Taxi https://www.thaiembassy.com/travel-to-thailand/bangkok-taxi-tips-how-to-get-a-taxi-in-bangkok Tuk Tuk River Ferry River Dinner Cruise Airport: Suvarnabhumi International Airport

item.title: Taipei
item.description: How to Get Around by Public Transportation Type of transportation: MRT, LRT, Bus, Taxi, Uber, Bike Type of MRT tickets: Admission to the trains is via blue plastic single-journey tokens or electronic stored value cards called EasyCards. Travelers can calculate single journey fare here, which depends on journey distance. Single Journey: NT$20 - NT$65 One-day EasyCards Pass: NT$150 24hr Taipei Metro Pass: NT$180 48hr Taipei Metro Pass: NT$280 72hr Taipei Metro Pass: NT$380 All Pass Ticket: NT$1,280 includes unlimited rides for 30 days on Taipei Metro, Taipei buses, and YouBike bike share.

item.title: Kualalumpur
item.description: Our offline app for Kuala Lumpur HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation MRT, KTM, LRT, KL, KLIA, BRT, RapidKL https://www.mymrt.com.my/projects/travel-with-mrt/ GOKL https://www.malaysia-traveller.com/KL-City-Bus.html Kuala Lumpur International Lumpur (KLIA) Airport Departure flight information https://airports.malaysiaairports.com.my/flight-information/departures Arriving flights https://airports.malaysiaairports.com.my/flight-information/arrivals Transit guide https://airports.malaysiaairports.com.my/transit/flight-transfers Getting to the Airport https://airports.malaysiaairports.com.my/getting-around/transport/public-transport Airport express: https://www.kliaekspres.com/ Airport map T1: https://airports.malaysiaairports.com.my/shop-dine-services/terminal-1-floor-map T2: https://airports.malaysiaairports.com.my/klia2/shop-dine-services/terminal-2-floor-map Transfer between terminals https://airports.malaysiaairports.com.my/transit/inter-terminal-transfer Shop, Dine, Relax and do more Dine T1: https://airports.malaysiaairports.com.my/shop-dine-services/shop T2: https://airports.malaysiaairports.com.my/klia2/shop-dine-services/dine
